articles.title: Israeli attacks secret Houthi meeting site in Yemen
articles.description: Houthi security forces quickly cordoned off the house
articles.content:
An Israeli airstrike early Sunday hit a house in southern Sanaa, Yemen, where a clandestine meeting of senior Houthi leaders was reportedly underway.

articles.description: BACOLOD CITY – A 38-year-old driver wanted for three counts of estafa in Quezon, Bukidnon, was arrested by police in Barangay Tapi, Kabankalan City, Negros...

articles.title: Suspect sought in deadly shooting of Democratic lawmakers in Minnesota
articles.description: Minnesota Police and the FBI kept up a massive manhunt on Saturday evening for a gunman posing as a police officer who killed a senior Democratic state assemblywoman and her husband in what Governor Tim Walz called a "politically motivated assassination."
articles.content: Law enforcement establish a security perimeter near the residence of senior Democratic state assemblywoman Melissa Hortman after Hortman and her husband, Marc, were shot and killed earlier in the day, in Brooklyn Park, Minnesota, June 14, 2025. A 57-... [6322 chars]

articles.title: NASA sets new potential launch date for Ax-4 mission to ISS
articles.description: NASA says a private astronaut mission could launch to the ISS as soon as June 19 as it works to understand an air leak on the station's Russian segment.
articles.content:
PARIS — NASA says a private astronaut mission could launch to the International Space Station as soon as June 19 as it works to understand an air leak on the Russian segment of the station.

articles.description: Bitcoin’s price decoupling from Binance open interest may signal looming volatility and potential liquidation cascades.
articles.content:

articles.title: 'No energy, intensity or aggression': Kerry boss Jack O’Connor bemoans lacklustre effort in Meath defeat
articles.description: Looking ahead to next weekend’s All-Ireland preliminary quarter-final expected to take place in Killarney, O’Connor hopes his team can wash this display out of their systems
articles.content:
Jack O’Connor wasn’t hiding from the fact that this was a miserable Kerry performance against Meath as they surrendered their automatic All-Ireland quarter-final spot.
